response.overview: Jana is a short Lebanese drama film that explores the psychological struggles of a young woman torn between tradition and personal freedom. Set in modern-day Beirut, the story follows Jana, a bride on the night of her wedding, as she confronts a dark secret that forces her to question everything she believes in. The film delicately examines themes of identity, societal pressure, and inner conflict in a patriarchal culture.
response.title: Jana
